name: cerb.data.geojson
description: Generate GeoJSON output from a given list of coordinates
script:
inputs:
  array/points:
    required@bool: yes
    
start:
  data.query:
    output: results
    inputs:
      query@text:
        type:sample.geo.points
        series.points:(
          {% for point_key, point in inputs.points %}
          {{point_key}}:(
            name:"{{point.name}}"
            coordinates:"POINT({{point.longitude}} {{point.latitude}})"
          )
          {% endfor %}
        )
        format:geojson
  return:
    points@key: results:data
